member.name: IUIAnimationTimerEventHandler.OnPostUpdate
member.summary: Handles events that occur after an animation update is finished.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See UIAnimation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTimerEventHandler.OnPreUpdate
member.summary: Handles events that occur before an animation update begins.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See UIAnimation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTimerEventHandler.OnRenderingTooSlow
member.summary: Handles events that occur when the rendering frame rate for an animation falls below a minimum desirable frame rate.
member.param: The current frame rate, in frames per second.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code. See UIAnimation Error Codes for a list of error codes.

member.name: IUIAnimationTimerEventHandler
member.summary: Defines methods for handling timing events.
